name: Philippe Fourrier Cuv√©e Prestige Brut Champagne
Etienne Oudart Blanc de Noirs Champagne
Brunelli Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2020
description: Intense ruby red color and, on the nose, sweet fruity notes ‚Äì redcurrants, blueberries and cherries ‚Äì as well as a characteristic hint of vanilla from the oak. It is particularly majestic on the palate: its soft, excellent tannins that give gratifying balance.

name: Schiena Angioino Primitivo Di Manduria 2022
description: Intense ruby red with purple reflections; complex bouquet with notes of spices; well-balanced, with a long-lasting taste.

name: Shafer TD9 2021
description: Vibrant, complex aromas of ripe red and black fruit, lavender, and herbs fill the glass followed by pure, energetic flavors of dried cherry, blackberry, strawberry, licorice, and cocoa all pulled together with wet slate minerality, clean acidity, and ripe, seamless tannins.

name: Domaine de la Janasse Ch√¢teauneuf-du-Pape Chaupin 2020
description:
The quintessential grenache in its most beautiful expression on his cradle Ch√¢teauneuf. Between
notes of black fruit and violets, this wine evoluates with very soft tannins already melted.

name: Degani Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2018
description: It is the wine is a deep garnet color, strong and full-bodied, firm, crisp scents, fresh. Great structure, with soft tannins and velvety, with chocolate and vanilla aftertaste.

name: Erikson & Caradin Ivy & Thistle Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
Cellier des Princes Le Blason du Prince Ch√¢teauneuf-du-Pape 2022
description: This wine presents a deep red colour. The nose is very intensive and complex, blending red and black fruits with spicy notes. It presents a nice structure in mouth with a good balance between alcohol and tannins.

name: Buena Vista Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley 2020
description:
Ever popular in the Vivino wine community, Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon embodies the rich heritage of California winemaking, showcasing a harmonious blend of bold flavor and refined elegance renowned in this area. With its luscious dark fruit and oaky notes, along with smooth, velvety tannins, the Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon offers a captivating embodiment of the prestigious Napa Valley terroir.

The Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon 2018 is particularly popular, and has earned itself almost 4,000 Vivino ratings, where the Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 has been given the accolade of featuring in the top 25 Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignons in the United States right now.

Offering an aesthetically pleasing dark, jewel-like red colour and appetising aroma, this full bodied wine opens up nicely with a smooth yet bold palate. The Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon pairs perfectly with beef, lamb, poultry and game such as deer and venison, making it a firm choice for dinner parties with hearty meat dishes. Its mouthfeel also complements mature and hard cheeses, making it a popular post-dinner accompaniment to a cheese board. Bon app√©tit!

name: Rombauer Vineyards Chardonnay 2022
description:
Not only celebrated by the Vivino community, but the award-winning Rombauer Vineyards Chardonnay (2011 Vintage) has featured in Vivino's 2020 Wine Style Awards and ranks #2 in Top 25 Napa Valley Chardonnay wines in California right now (1980 Vintage).

Produced in the family-run Rombauer Vineyards winery, this pale yellow carneros chardonnay is an ode to its rich heritage, and has all the trademarks of a Rombauer Vineyards wine we‚Äôve come to know and love. The well-drained soil and warm, sunny days and cool nights, make the Napa Valley region of California ideal for slow and even grape ripening. This leads to the most prestigious and lusted over chardonnays in the world. For an unparalleled white wine tasting journey, consider the 2001 vintage of Rombauer Vineyards chardonnay. This particular year rates better than any other year for this wine, truly representing the pinnacle of chardonnay.

With notes of mature yellow peach, melon and chamomile, encased within the embrace of a just-baked pie crust, this popular Rombauer Vineyards Carneros Chardonnay leaves you wanting more. Described by the Vivino community as ‚Äòoutstanding‚Äô and a ‚Äòconsistently enjoyable wine with enough acidity to offset the crazy malolactic buttery smooth mouthfeel‚Äô.
One wine reviewer even hails it as a ‚Äògreat balance of fruit and butter and is probably by far the best chardonnay I've ever tasted‚Äô.

Pair Rombauer Vineyards Chardonnay with vegetarian dishes, or pork, poultry and rich fish such as salmon and tuna, to delight your dinner party guests with a symphony of complementary flavors.

name: Rombauer Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
description: Hints of mint, eucalyptus, and cedar are present in the nose while moderate tannins balance layers of dark berries and black cherries on the palate. This is a fruit driven Cabernet Sauvignon that has the tannin structure to last many years, but drinks well now.

name: Veuve Clicquot Brut Ros√© Champagne
description: This copper-colored beauty offers deep cherry, butterscotch candy and pastry-shop aromas, with whiffs of cinnamon and nutmeg. Cherry and croissant-pastry flavors are kept in check with a slight mineral tang; in the mouth, it's medium-weight, with medium bead. Finishes with complex caramel-chalk flavors. "Dig it," wrote one reviewer, who cautioned that it might be too elegant.

name: Bollinger Special Cuv√©e Brut A√ø Champagne
allergens: Contains sulfites, egg allergens, milk allergens

name: DAOU Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: This wine displays a magnificent, compelling and inviting nose that is quintessential of Cabernet Sauvignon. Unrestrained wild cherry, currant and mulberry fragrances arise with pronounced notes of cocoa, coriander, and wintergreen. Sublayers of dried herbs, cedar, tobacco leaf and slate provide substantive foundation to the aromatic profile. On the palate a veritable explosion of fresh, ripe, dark berry fruits. Tangy blackberry, juicy black cherry, pomegranate and cranberry are mingled with lovely blueberry and raspberry accents, underscored with kirsch and rhubarb. Integrated nicely with toasty oak, graphite and forest floor. Full bodied and a very silky texture, this wine glides into a long, generous finish resonating with ripe fruit and exotic spice allowing an amazing aging capabilities.

name: Mount Peak Rattlesnake Zinfandel 2021
description: Filled with an alluring mouthwatering quality with robust flavors that includes ripe blueberries, blackberries, cherry jam and fig all tied together by a brambly undertone. Accents of white pepper, licorice and smoke weave through wine, deepening throughout the luscious finish.

name: Orin Swift Slander Pinot Noir 2022
description: Vivid ruby red in color, the wine is perfumed with intriguing aromas of rose petal, bitter cherry, mineral notes, and a hint of sweet spice. Opening with verve and energy, the palate is treated to intense red and black fruit flavors with a generous core of stewed raspberry, cola, and forest floor. The tannins are chewy and lush yet held in balance with a bright acidic note that fleshes out for a lengthy finish.

name: Rombauer Vineyards Chardonnay Proprietor Selection 2022
description: A delicate yellow hue which will deepen in color with bottle age. Ripe pear, apricot and nectarine aromas unite with hints of honey. Vibrant layers of pineapple, yellow peach and vanilla create depth and weight throughout the palate. Nuances of crisp apple linger building weight in finish.

name: Orin Swift Eight Years In The Desert 2022
St√©phane Usseglio Fragments Ch√¢teauneuf du Pape 2018
Austin Hope Austin Cabernet Sauvignon
description:
Full-bodied and rich, balanced by a touch of acidity and firm, polished tannins, Austin Hope‚Äôs
Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon is as popular for dinner gatherings as it is a go-to for hearty lunches at home. Boasting a deep, ruby red colour, this aesthetically pleasing red‚Äôs nose is complex with aromas of blackberry, black cherry and cassis, followed by earthy notes of vanilla, leather, oak and spice. 

Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon pairs delightfully with beef, lamb, game and poultry, due to its tannins, which help cut through the richness and fattiness of these meats, enhancing their flavors and providing a pleasing balance. Beyond its taste, Austin Hope Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon's iconic bottle and label makes it an excellent choice for gifting, guaranteed to delight recipients on any celebratory occasion.

This exquisite cabernet sauvignon is celebrated as having ‚Äòa riot of mixed ripe black fruit in the mouth‚Äô, with one member of the Vivino community admitting that it is ‚Äòone of the best wines I‚Äôve had at this price point! Lots of fruit but very smooth and balanced. Mid-body cab, but drinks bigger.‚Äô You can read hundreds of Vivino users‚Äô honest reviews and see for yourself before trying. As for which vintage to opt for, all possess their own charm, but Austin Hope Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 ranks number one in the top 25 Californian Cabernet Sauvignon wines in the United States right now.

name: Frisson Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
description: Unbridled, youthful quality of plum, black cherry and illiberality fruit that is balanced by an elegant layer of cedar, tobacco leaf and Thai basil in both the nose and on the palate.  A bit headstrong, and beautifully balanced, this velvety, unctuous Cabernet embodies the best of the vineyard.  With its perfectly ripe fruit, just the right amount of oak and rich tannin's.

name: Terre Nere Campigli Vallone Brunello di Montalcino 2017
J. Moreau & Fils Chablis 1er Cru 'Mont de Milieu' 2018
description:
Visual: Pale gold in colour.
Nose: Fine nose reminiscent of lemon, grapefruit, and chlorophyll.
Palate: Elegant, supple and fruity, with exotic fruit and butter flavours. Good length.

name: Paul Jaboulet A√Æn√© Hermitage La Petite Chapelle 2014
description: It has intense and aromatic with sweet spices, floral notes as well as very ripe fruit. Powerful and harmonious and a very long finish.
allergens: Contains sulfites, egg allergens, milk allergens

name: Acumen Mountainside Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: This full-bodied wine opens with aromas of violets, lavender, fresh rosemary, and espresso. On the palate we find flavors of black cherries, red plums, mountain blueberries, mission figs, and chocolate covered orange peel with sweet clay, freshly turned earth, and pencil shavings giving way to ripe, mouth-coating tannins on the long and powerful finish.

name: Ch√¢teau du Grand Bos Graves Rouge 2015
description: Aromas and flavors blackberry and dried cherries fruit followed by crushed stones and tobacco notes. Balanced and focused with a pretty finish that lingers.

name: Erikson & Caradin Craftsmen & Wolves Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
Croce di Mezzo Brunello di Montalcino 2015
description: Intense ruby red, tending towards garnet on nails. spicy with soft tannins and and hints that go from vanilla to wild berries and red berries. soft and persistant, dry, harmonious with a noteworthy structure.

name: Tom Eddy Greeg Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
Beau Vigne Owner's Reserve Guest Cottage Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
Tom Eddy Greeg Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
Schrader Cabernet Sauvignon RBS Beckstoffer To Kalon Vineyard 2019
Shafer Hillside Select Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
description: Aromas and flavours of dark cherry, black coffee, sweet vanilla and wet forest floor with rose petal, cranberry, blueberry, oregano, and sage.

name: Caymus Vineyards Special Selection Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
Revana Terroir Series Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
description: It has deep, dark, opaque purple colour; Scrumptious aromas of crushed black fruits, chocolate covered raspberries, espresso and violets. The mouth feel is rich and concentrated, with smooth, silky tannins. Flavours of plum, blackberries, freshly cut blueberries and coffee lead to a long, luxurious finish.

name: Keever Inspirado 2018
description: Aromas of this rich, fully ripe Bordeaux-blend style wine are as complex as they are intense. On the palate, the entry is driven by flavors of boysenberry, blueberry, and fresh raspberries, with the darker notes of mocha, vanilla and cedar a dding weight to the mid-palate. Bright and soft at the finish.

name: Boars‚Äô View The Coast Pinot Noir 2018
Meyer Family Cellars Le Bon Bon 2017
Villa Poggio Salvi Pomona Brunello di Montalcino 2017
description:
It is color	Brilliant ruby ‚Äã‚Äãred.it is scent Harmonic, intense, with red fruits and spices notes. it is 
taste.Complex and captivating with elegant tannins Which guarantee a very long aging.
allergens: Contains sulfites, egg allergens, milk allergens

name: Taittinger Comtes de Champagne Blanc de Blancs 2012
description: Its pure bouquet opens with a contrast between an already well-developed intensity and a finesse that reveals aromas of pears and white flowers. After a little time, the intensity presents the aromatic richness and maturity of a wine that is already expressing great potential.

name: Caymus Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description:
Celebrated by the Vivino community as ‚Äòbold yet smooth; rich and complex‚Äô, ‚Äòvery well balanced‚Äô and ‚Äòwonderful on the first sip‚Äô, this Caymus Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon demands attention.

The vibrant, oaky and earthy Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, with subtle black fruit undertones, is reassuringly bold and velvety, and for this reason, has earned its place as one of the Vivino community‚Äôs favourite Cabernet Sauvignons. One Vivino member even commented, ‚ÄòJust wow! An explosion of different flavors‚Äô, and another admitted that they were ‚Äònot sure how much better you can get for any price‚Äô.

With origins in the renowned Caymus Vineyards, the famous winemaking region‚Äôs unique heritage can be tasted with each drop. In 1972, Chuck Wagner and his late parents, Lorna and Charlie Sr., opened Caymus Vineyards, starting off with 240 cases of Cabernet Sauvignon. Over half a century later, Caymus Vineyards in Napa Valley remains 100% family-owned and run, and uses many of the same winemaking techniques of generations before.

If you‚Äôre looking for a specific year to try first, Caymus Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 vintage is ranked 93 by wine professional, Wilfred Wong. However, Caymus Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2020 and 2018 vintages are both in high demand across the U.S. and beyond. Pair any of these vintages with beef, lamb, game, poultry or a cheese board for a dinner party match made in heaven. Bon app√©tit!

name: Dom P√©rignon Brut Champagne 2013
description:
The immediate impression is of the mildness of the pure, airy, bright bouquet. A floral, fruity pastel tone then unfolds and quickly darkens into candied fruit, ripe hay and toasted notes, along with hints of licorice.

Dom P√©rignon's Brut Champagne is a revered and iconic wine that represents the pinnacle of champagne craftsmanship. Produced by the renowned champagne house Mo√´t & Chandon, Dom P√©rignon is a symbol of luxury and excellence in the world of sparkling wines.

Dom P√©rignon was named in honor of the 17th-century Benedictine monk Dom P√©rignon, who is often credited with important contributions to champagne production. While the historical accuracy of these claims is debated, the name pays homage to the legacy of innovation and refinement in the art of winemaking.

Dom P√©rignon Brut is typically made from a blend of Chardonnay and Pinot Noir grapes, which are carefully selected from the finest vineyards in the Champagne region of France. The grapes are hand-harvested to ensure the utmost quality.

The winemaking process for Dom P√©rignon Brut is characterized by precision and traditional methods. After the initial fermentation, the wines are carefully blended to achieve the desired flavor profile. This cuv√©e is known for its meticulous attention to detail and the artistry of the cellar master in crafting a consistent and exceptional wine.

Dom P√©rignon Brut Champagne is celebrated for its exquisite taste. It typically offers a pale gold or straw color with a delicate and persistent effervescence. On the nose, it reveals a complex bouquet of citrus fruits, floral notes, brioche, and subtle mineral undertones. The palate is marked by a fine balance of freshness, creaminess, and vivacity, with flavors of green apple, pear, toasted almond, and a long, lingering finish.

name: Shafer One Point Five Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: Aromas of crushed red and black summer berries, rose petal and herbs. In the mouth the generous, lush black and red fruits integrate enticingly with sage, tobacco leaf, smoke and black spice all wrapped within a structure of ripe Stags Leap District tannins.

name: Gaja Costa Russi (Barbaresco) Langhe 2017
description: Elegance and crystal purity characterize this extremely complex and densely woven wine.

name: Orin Swift Machete 2021
description: Aromas of cr√®me de cassis, boysenberry, and ripe cherries are complemented by a soft minerality and hints of dark chocolate. The entry is smooth with dark plums and a charred meatiness that creates a velvety texture that lingers.

name: Austin Hope Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description:
Austin Hope Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon is a highly regarded wine originating from California's Paso Robles region. Crafted by Austin Hope, a prominent winemaker and owner of Hope Family Wines, this Cabernet Sauvignon has earned a stellar reputation within the world of wine.

Paso Robles, known for its diverse terroir and microclimates, provides an ideal setting for producing exceptional Cabernet Sauvignon. This wine primarily consists of Cabernet Sauvignon grapes, renowned for their deep color, robust flavors, and potential for aging.

The winemaking process is characterized by meticulous attention to detail. Grapes are hand-harvested and carefully sorted before undergoing fermentation in stainless steel tanks. The wine then ages in a combination of new and used French oak barrels, imparting complexity and structure.

Austin Hope's Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon boasts a deep, inky hue and a rich aromatic profile. It is characterized by ripe dark fruit notes, including blackberry and plum, complemented by cassis, mocha, and subtle spice. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied experience with velvety tannins and a satisfying, enduring finish.

Notably, this wine is appreciated for its aging potential. While it is enjoyable when young, it has the capacity to evolve and gain greater complexity and depth with several years of bottle aging, making it a prized choice among wine collectors.

Austin Hope Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon has garnered numerous accolades and high ratings from wine critics, firmly establishing its status as a premier wine. Additionally, Hope Family Wines, including Austin Hope, is dedicated to sustainable and environmentally responsible winemaking practices, underscoring their commitment to preserving the land for future generations.

name: Bernardus Marinus 2013
description: This wine exhibits a vivid deep crimson color and appears nearly opaque. Aromas express beautifully ripened red fruits accented by notes of dried spices and cedar with hints of toasted oak. Intense, spicy flavors of plum and black cherry fill the mouth and linger beautifully through a long and silky finish.

name: Degani Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2017
description: It is the wine is a deep garnet color, strong and full-bodied, firm, crisp scents, fresh. Great structure, with soft tannins and velvety, with chocolate and vanilla aftertaste.

name: Erikson & Caradin Bilateral Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description:
Smooth, rich and chocolatey are the top three things that spring to mind when the Vivino community thinks about Erikson & Caradin Bilateral Cabernet Sauvignon. Easily drinkable, this bold red wine is renowned for its rich, chocolate flavor profile, dark fruity notes and subtle hints of cherry. 

Want to know what to pair this wine with at your next dinner party? Our knowledgeable community suggests this wine goes exceptionally well with beef, lamb, game, poultry and mature cheese, making it perfect for enjoying alongside heavier dishes such as stews and casseroles. It‚Äôs also a great wine for sipping with a cheese board for a more savory take on a dessert. 

Erikson & Caradin Bilateral Cabernet Sauvignon 2020 vintage is popular among Vivino users with more than 70 ratings, while the 2018 vintage rates better than any other year of this particular wine.

If you want to find out more about this wine from our informative reviews, read more about its different vintages and browse the pricing, you‚Äôve come to the right place. Vivino is the place to be for wine lovers all over the US.

name: Brown Estate Chaos Theory 2020
description: Its intense billowing fragrance begins with blue fruits then shifts markedly to red fruit and flowers ‚Äì blueberry, mulberry, blackberry, then bing cherry, violet, and rose. Ripe fruit commingles with tart pomegranate and winter spice, further revealing sassafras root, subtle spearmint, and cherry cola with gravel, loam, and hint of minerality. Mouthfeel is dense, rich, and decadent with loads of luscious fruit, vanillin, and cascading spice.

name: Tezza Corte Majoli Amarone della Valpolicella 2020
Ch√¢teau les Ormes Saint-Julien 2020
description: Frankly ripe, toasty style, with dark espresso, licorice and wood spice notes leading the way for plum cake and blackberry fruit. A fleshy, roasted edge hangs through the finish. A bit overt in style, but still rather solid. Drink now through 2017.

name: Verdon Estate Reserve No.3 Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
Sei Querce Six Oaks Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
Thurlow Cellars Pit Viper Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
Verdon Estate Reserve No.5 Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
Yount Ridge Proprietary Blend 2019
description: Lovely complexity defines the aromas of this Bordeaux‚Äêstyle blend. Ripe blueberry, dark anise and woodsy notes, a hint of bright raspberry and a touch of sweet herbals show both in the aromas as well as the flavors of this lively blend. Somewhat lighter than the Cabernet in structure, the wine shows its composition with hints of sweet bay leaf and dried cherry on the finish.

name: Beau Vigne Reserve Proprietary Red 2021
description:
Proving you don‚Äôt hold the name ‚Äòhero‚Äô for nothing, Beau Vigne Hero Proprietary Red is something a little special within the Vivino community and beyond. Produced in Beau Vigne winery, Hero Proprietary Red has all the trademarks of a prodigious Napa Valley wine we‚Äôve come to know and love. 

Due to favorable growing conditions for a wide range of grapes, from warm-weather varieties like Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Sauvignon Blanc, to cool-weather varieties like Chardonnay and Pinot Noir, the Napa Valley lends itself to producing premium quality wines ‚Äì which is why it‚Äôs no surprise this bold, Californian red is strikingly popular.

Boasting a rich, dark tone, and giving a silky, soft, round entrance on the palate, Beau Vigne Reserve Proprietary Red is an extremely favourable wine for dinner parties up and down the U.S. It‚Äôs also the perfect red to accompany a hearty meat dish, such as veal, lamb, poultry and beef, propelling its favor in the hosting world.

Coming with an unrivalled accolade, Beau Vigne Hero Proprietary Red 2018 is rated better than any other year for this wine, and Beau Vigne Hero Proprietary Red Napa Valley 2019 is rated among the top 3% of all wines in the world. With notes of black fruit, plum jam, cassis, coffee grinds, dark chocolate, charred wood, toasted cedar and licorice, our users have described it as ‚Äòfull bodied with a medium plus finish‚Äô and ‚Äògreat tasting with a bite‚Äô.

name: Caro (Catena and Rothschild) Caro 2019
description: Intense, deep red colour with fine hints of purple. The nose offers pleasant aromas of red and dark fruit, with redcurrants and blackcurrants and then finishing with mint and cedar. The bouquet fills out with notes of vanilla, spices and mocha, characteristic of French oak.
allergens: Contains sulfites, egg allergens, milk allergens

name: Croce di Mezzo Brunello di Montalcino Riserva 2015
description: Intense ruby red with tending to garnet which accentuates with. Extraordinarily soft tannins with notes of vanilla and liquorice. Very spicy. Dry, soft, harmonious, complex, persistant, strong structure with much tannin.

name: Bella Union Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: Bright red cranberry, raspberry, boysenberry, dark plum and earth aromas, married with vanilla spice, toast, warm caramel and coffee aromas. The palate expands with concentrated, dark red fruit, black cherry, boysenberry and plum. On the finish, the palate gives way to warm toasted flavors complemented by toffee and coffee notes.

name: Zenato Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2018
description: Deep ruby red, acquiring touches of garnet with age. Elegant, warm, spicy, with hints of black cherry, dried fruit, and prunes in particular. Round, velvety and smooth.

name: Aviara Prana Block M5 Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
Miner The Oracle 2016
description: Aromas of raspberry and dark cherry with a hint of eucalyptus, The Oracle is decandent, but with finesse.

name: Brown Estate Napa Valley Zinfandel 2022
description: Medium body with silky mouth feel. The palate at first delivers a burst of ripe red fruits, heavy cream and loads of cascading exotic spices finishing with subtle crushed black pepper.

name: Cakebread Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: Luxurious dark cherry, boysenberry, blackcurrant and black fig aromas, with scents of oak toast and dark chocolate. The wine‚Äôs vibrant acidity, supple, seamlessly integrated tannins and impeccable balance contribute to a round, plush mouthfeel, leading to a long, savoury finish marrying rich boysenberry fruit. French oak spice and a hint of dark chocolate.

name: E. Guigal Ermitage Ex-Voto 2018
description:
Eye : Deep dark ruby colour with mauve tints.
Nose : Black fruits, leather, liquorice, coffee flavour and oriental spices.
Palate : Powerful attack with richness and an important tannic structure. This wine expression fully the terroir trough its finesse and the strength of its tannins.
Overall : Great ageing potential, structured and concentrated with a rare intensity of flavour and colour.

name: Beringer Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: The enticing aromas of ripe blackberry, boysenberry, fresh tobacco, brown spice and sweet mint are profound in the glass. Dense and well-structured, its supple tannins are complemented by notes of espresso, mocha and balanced with a silky and elegant finish.

name: DAOU Unbound Reserve 2020
description: Inky dark purple, with fragrant, heady aromatics of warm blueberry cobbler, elderberry and black currants. Ripe plum and black raspberry notes are accented with cigar box, crushed herbs and fennel. Power with grace, this wine unfurls like a cherry blossom, revealing layers of blue and black fruit flavors. Cherry, olallieberry, and Zante currant, with truffle, lilac and sandalwood notes are integrated and well structured. Silky, fine grained tannins provide ample support for the voluptuous fruit. Positively sumptuous on the long, generous finish. Lingering cherry, red delicious apple and just a hint of mint display tenacious longevity. A wine with a lot to offer.

name: Domaine Carneros Le R√™ve Blanc de Blancs 2015
description: Aromas of honeysuckle, ginger, baked pear, spice, tropical fruit, and toasted brioche. The rich, round palate is balanced by acidity and notes of white fruit, cr√®me br√ªl√©e and toasted almond that linger through a long, silky finish.

name: DAOU Reserve Eye of the Falcon 2019
description: Deeply and intensely colored, this is a massive wine with a complex, sophisticated nose, offering black currant, cassis, sweet cherry and blackberry, with underlying layers of graphite, tobacco leaf, leather and wet gravel. Soft notes of menthol and desert sage weave together and integrate the aromas of fruit and earth. Breathtakingly bright fruit immediately greets the palate, juicy boysenberry, crushed cherries and fresh blueberries, with cranberry and raspberry accented by cedar, black plum and dried herbs. Powerful and rich, polished in style and structure, the opulent fruit core transitions seamlessly and exquisitely to a robust mid- palate showing black olive, licorice and eastern spices, finishing long and elegantly with black cherry, cocoa and plum. An outstanding vintage.

name: DAOU Reserve Eye of the Falcon 2020
description: Deeply and intensely colored, this is a massive wine with a complex, sophisticated nose, offering black currant, cassis, sweet cherry and blackberry, with underlying layers of graphite, tobacco leaf, leather and wet gravel. Soft notes of menthol and desert sage weave together and integrate the aromas of fruit and earth. Breathtakingly bright fruit immediately greets the palate, juicy boysenberry, crushed cherries and fresh blueberries, with cranberry and raspberry accented by cedar, black plum and dried herbs. Powerful and rich, polished in style and structure, the opulent fruit core transitions seamlessly and exquisitely to a robust mid- palate showing black olive, licorice and eastern spices, finishing long and elegantly with black cherry, cocoa and plum. An outstanding vintage.

name: Orin Swift Papillon 2021
description: Bright, ruby red in complexion with a lively perfume of crushed boysenberry, spring flowers, cr√®me de cassis, and a hint of toast. Lush flavors of blackberry tart and ripe plum lead to a juicy mid-palate mix of currant, mocha and dark chocolate. Well-integrated, polished tannins are present on the finish, which linger effortlessly with just the right amount of power and intensity.

name: Beringer Napa Valley Distinction Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Black Label) 2019
description:
Hailing from one of the most luxurious wine regions in the world, Napa Valley, Beringer Distinction Series Cabernet Sauvignon is a full bodied red wine that‚Äôs perfect for both special occasions and sophisticated dinner parties. Bold in flavor with silky tannins and oak characteristics, you can expect notes of black fruit, leather and smoke for a balanced complexity. 

Wildly loved by the Vivino community, it is recommended you pair this wine with hearty meat dishes such as beef, lamb, game and chicken, alongside mature, hard cheeses. Why not try serving it up at your next charcuterie evening? If our wine community is anything to go by, we‚Äôre sure it will go down a hit. 

Beringer is one of Napa‚Äôs most iconic wineries, dating back 145 years and is renowned for being innovators within the wine industry. Not only this, but they are the only winery to have both a red and white wine named #1 wine in the world by Wine Spectator. 

If you want to learn more about this wine‚Äôs vintages, read reviews, or learn prices, you‚Äôve come to the right place.

name: F√©lix Sol√≠s Mucho M√°s Tinto
description:
One of the world's most renowned Spanish wines, N.V. F√©lix Sol√≠s Mucho M√°s Tinto is a fruity, yet deep full bodied red from F√©lix Sol√≠s, a family-run company that has its roots in heritage and history, while still managing to maintain its reputation of excellence. 

Sitting somewhere between dry and sweet, you can expect deep flavors of vanilla, oak and tobacco, enriched with sweet notes of red cherry and plum. Because of its slightly lighter flavor profile, this wine is perfect to be enjoyed at lunch or dinner, though our wine experts believe its best paired with beef, pasta, veal and poultry. It‚Äôs the perfect bottle to pick up and enjoy over lunch with friends, dinner with a loved one, or sipped together on the sofa on your next romantic date night. 

If you want to join the thousands of other Vivino users who have rated N.V. F√©lix Sol√≠s Mucho M√°s Tinto, pick up a bottle today, or lose yourself in our reviews, flavor profiles and winery profile before you decide to take the plunge.

name: Yarra Yering Underhill Shiraz 2012
description: It has beautifully constructed with precise and expressive fruit. Soft and integrated tannins give it a sexy mouthfill and a fabulous minute long finish.

name: Ch√¢teau des Bachelards - Comtesse de Vazeilles Saint-Amour 2018
description: Dress: deep and bright garnet. Nose: intense black pepper, black licorice and iris of a beautiful depth. Mouth: the wine is dense and tight, very firm with body, in a Moulin-√†-Vent style rather light as it is often lent to Saint-Amour and has a great potential for evolution.
wineryName: Ch√¢teau des Bachelards - Comtesse de Vazeilles

name: Bastioni della Rocca Appassimento 2021
allergens: Contains sulfites, egg allergens, milk allergens

name: Beringer Knights Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
description: The Knights Valley has a vibrant fruit core, hints of brown spice and pink peppercorns, and a lingering finish of ripe black fruit. A bit of Merlot was added to this wine to round out the mid-palate and a touch of Cabernet Franc lifts the aromatics of the wine and delivers an elegant finish.

name: El Enemigo Malbec 2020
description: A nice medium to fuller bodied Malbec. It is boasting dark blackberry and plum fruit flavors coupled with notes of baking spice, cocoa, toast and vanilla.

name: Illahe Bon Sauvage Pinot Noir 2021
description: Intensely aromatic forest floor and sweet black fruit set the stage for ripe black cherry, smoky minerals and herbs, all wrapped up in a long finish.

name: Charles Heidsieck Ros√© R√©serve
description: A powder pink ros√©, with a delicate sparkle. A complex nose of homemade strawberry jam and fresh gingerbread. A deep wine with an aromatic finish.
allergens: Contains sulfites, egg allergens, milk allergens

name: Sequoia Grove Cabernet Sauvignon  2022
description: Dark red/black in color, the nose gives an immediate aroma of raspberries and warm baking spices, leading into cassis and clove. The palate has elements of pie crust, with smooth, silky tannins and well balanced acidity.

name: The Hess Collection Lion Tamer Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
Beaulieu Vineyard (BV) Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
description: It has fruit flavors, vibrant acidity and mature, muscular tannins allowed us to complement the wine with bolder amounts of vanilla-oak and mocha nuances this year‚Äîboth from new barrels and long oak aging.

name: DAOU Seventeen Forty Reserve 2021
description: This is a full-bodied wine that exhibits high-class aromas of black currants, coffee bean, crushed flowers, and hints of dark chocolate. Seamless on the palate, it starts with black fruit flavors, builds on silky tannins, and finishes with notes of vanilla, olives, and licorice. Throughout, it is fresh, elegant and shows bright fruit accompanied with great acidity.

name: Barker's Marque Wines Woolpack Sauvignon Blanc 2022
Donne Fittipaldi Bolgheri 2021
description: Ruby red. Very fruity with notes cherry, currant and spicy background notes. A very fresh and very harmonious wine. Great elegance and with a taste spectrum where the sweet and silky tannins lead to a finale of great pleasure.

name: Henri Musso Ch√¢teau Les Landes de Cach Pauillac 2017
description: It has brilliant purple color, lot of finesse with riped red fruits aromas, well balanced elegant tannins and delicate light wood for a good structure.

name: Bodegas Vilano Reserva 2019
description: Ruby red color bright and deep. Spicy aromas of pepper, cinnamon, vanilla and nuts. In the mouth it is meaty, broad and with elegance and personality.

name: Textbook Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
description: Rich and full-bodied, with a dense purple color, beautiful inky fruit, and touches of graphit and earth. There's lots of blackberry as well in this full-bodied wine.

name: Beringer Luminus Chardonnay 2020
description: Aromas of honeysuckle, hazelnut and buttered citrus are followed by a medium-bodied white with admirable fruit intensity, decent acidity and nicely integrated wood. This cuvee is put through partial rather than full malolactic, and that appears to preserve a lot of vibrancy and freshness

name: William Hill Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon 2022
description:
The 2022 DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon exemplifies Paso Robles. The nose is highly perfumed, showing aromas of black cherry, cassis, plum, desert sage, sandalwood, and dusty minerality. Secondary aromas reveal notes of cigar box, leather, bay leaf, and black olive. The palate is rich and weighty, offering generous flavors of black raspberry, spicy currant, and blueberry compote with impressions of Bing cherry, Boysenberry, fig, and baking spices. Ripe, fine-grained tannins carry into a structured finish with lingering accents of cherry, espresso, and vanilla.

Barrel Aging: 
8 months in 50% new French oak

name: Emmolo Merlot 2021
description: A dark plum color, this wine opens with the scents of baking chocolate and fig, enhanced by notes of dried stone fruit, Christmas spice and wisps of Mesquite smoke. The palate is rich and supple, driven by dark berry flavors. Fresh earthiness and smoky notes rounded out with tannins that are leathery and smooth.

name: DAOU Reserve Chardonnay 2021
description: Defined by the cooler 2018 vintage, this Chardonnay offers beautiful aromas of pineapple and lemon pie accompanied by wonderful notes of vanilla and hazelnut flavors. While dark and loaded with a creamy and fleshy texture, it provides a great experience throughout with a finish that lingers on the palette and tantalizes the senses. True to the vintage, this wine bears a beautiful level of acidity that will allow it to pair very well with a wide variety of cuisines.

name: Verdon Estate Proprietary Red Reserve No. 8 2019
Orin Swift Abstract 2022
description: The aromas are all berry and black fruits, with neatly integrated caramelized oak. A huge entry coats the mouth. The wine has tons of weight on the mid-palate and is dense with layers of ripe cherry and strawberries. The finish is laced with long soft tannins that go on and on.

name: J Vineyards Brut Ros√©
description: Brut Ros√© sparkles with a luminous cool pink hue and exudes delicate aromas of strawberry, nectarine and juicy red apples. On the palate, the wine opens with flavors of cherry, blood orange, citrus peel and tropical star fruit that are underlined by a bright acidity that keeps the overall impression delightfully fresh.

name: Brewer-Clifton 3D Pinot Noir 2015
description: Aromas of bright wild strawberries are mixed with brown spice and darjeeling on the nose. The palate is textured almost like a black tea with flavors of shoyu and wild strawberries. Shows great today but this wine will shed its layers in the cellar as well.

name: Tussock Jumper Sauvignon Blanc 2022
description: Vibrant fruit characteristics of melon and blackcurrant balanced with fresh citrus notes.Full and lively palate with ripe tropical fruit and balanced with a dry, crisp finish.

name: Michael David Winery Earthquake Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
Wines from Hahn Estate Appellation Series Chardonnay 2021
Au Contraire Reserve Mighty Mouse Chardonnay 2018
description: It has pronounced pear and golden yellow apple lined with a floral note of jasmine, apricot, and vanilla bean. The tree fruit notes are complemented by tropical and citrus notes along with a hint of brioche. A round, elegant mouthfeel is balanced by a hint of minerality on the lingering finish.

name: Sling & Spear Zinfandel 2017
description:
This rich and intense red from Sling and Spear winery is constantly growing in popularity with the Vivino community. With origins in the Dry Creek Valley wine region, located northwest of Healdsburg town and south of Lake Sonoma, this Californian Zinfandel is fresh, pure and silky smooth. In fact, this bold, fruity red comes out in the top 12% of all wines from Dry Creek Valley.

The bold flavor profile boasts notes of black fruit, with oaky and earthy undertones. Pairing perfectly with beef, lamb and poultry, this makes an excellent dinner wine. One member of the Vivino community even suggested that the Sling & Spear Zinfandel is ‚Äòbig enough to stand up to spicy Asian food yet subtle enough to pair with a steak.‚Äô

The Sling & Spear Zinfandel 2017 vintage is well worth a try, given that it‚Äôs secured its place as Vivino users‚Äô favorite, boasting more than 200 glowing ratings. Having said this, Sling & Spear Zinfandel 2016 vintage rates better than any other year for this wine.

name: Quilt The Woven Cellar Aged Release 2016
Buena Vista Chateau Buena Vista Chardonnay 2020
Ch√¢teau Saincrit Fougue 2019
description:
Bold and dry, Ch√¢teau Saincrit Fougue is a bordeaux red wine that delivers the same sophisticated flavor profile as other wines from the renowned French region. Loved by our community for providing elegance at a reasonable price point, this wine is perfect for sharing dinners with friends or family on cozy Saturday nights. 

Slightly acidic with a fruity aftertaste, you can expect oaky notes of oak, vanilla and cola, perfectly balanced alongside black fruit notes including blackberry and plum and red notes such as strawberry. This wine also has subtle notes of cinnamon for a warming feel. The Vivino community recommends this wine be paired with hearty stews, beef, veal and game, alongside poultry focused dishes such as chicken and duck. 

Read on to find more information on this wine, including detailed reviews from our passionate community and prices. You can also compare vintages of the best Ch√¢teau Saincrit Fougue throughout the years.

name: Kukeri Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: This wine exhibits dark concentrated fruit flavors of mountain blueberry and black raspberry and well-integrated fine-grained tannins with excellent mountain acidity. Big, bold, and ultra-ripe on the attack, packed with small black-fruit preserves and blueberry, doused with cr√®me de wine.

name: Rockslide Vineyards Sawtooth Ridge Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
Grant Burge The Holy Trinity Red Blend 2018
description: After crushing, the juice was fermented at cool temperatures on skins for 7 to 8 days depending on the batch and variety. Once fermentation was complete, selected parcels were either pressed into stainless steel for settling or left in their original fermenters for extended maceration for 3- 4 weeks.

name: Beau Vigne Barrel Chaser 2021
description: Barrel Chaser is a supple, plush and ripe wine from the start. It is quick to begin with a beautiful fragrance of red flower potpourri, cherry preserves, light mocha, espresso bean and cola berry.

name: Ty Caton Vineyards Caton Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
Beringer Knights Valley Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
description: The Beringer winemaking team has worked the Knights Valley vineyards for two decades, watching the vineyards evolve and noting which blocks and rows are particularly unique. Using fruit from those prized blocks, Mark Beringer has crafted the Knights Valley Reserve Cabernet, which provides the purest and most layered expression of the unique terroir found in Knights Valley.

name: Bonanza Cabernet Sauvignon Lot
description:
Bold, dry and full-bodied, this great value for money Bonanza Cabernet Sauvignon is an all-time favourite within the Vivino community. Crafted by Chuck Wagner at Caymus Vineyards, this wine is a delightful and highly accessible choice to complement a meal, making it perfect for dinner parties. Pairs exquisitely with beef, lamb, game and poultry, with velvety tannins cutting through meat with ease. One Vivino user also mentioned in their Bonanza Cabernet Sauvignon review that this wine pairs exceptionally well with a fillet steak. The bold flavor profile boasts notes of oak, vanilla and chocolate, as well as black and red fruits, adding to its unique balance of smoothness and dryness.

Boasting a highly regarded position in the top 5% of wines from California, Bonanza Cabernet Sauvignon Lot N.V. has a huge reputation preceding it. Coming exceptionally highly-acclaimed, the Vivino community Bonanza Cabernet Sauvignon reviews speak for themselves. ‚ÄòOutstanding wine!‚Äô, ‚Äòexcellent California cab with all the vanilla leather dark fruit you look for‚Äô and ‚Äòan affordable yet excellent non vintage California cab‚Äô are among just some of the glowing Bonanza Cabernet Sauvignon reviews.

name: Edict Napa Valley Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
description: Deep Ruby Red. Explosive nose of blackberry and blackcurrant. Rich, dense, full-bodied, and refined in texture, packed with blue-fruit preserves and sweet spice, bracketed by polished tannin backbone.

name: Ketcham Estate Five Clone Pinot Noir 2018
Ant Moore Blalock + Moore Sauvignon Blanc 2022
St Hallett Higher Earth Syrah 2018
description: This wine represents the higher altitude and cooler climate of the Eden Valley. A Syrah distinctive of the sub-region, showcasing elegance and finesse, sourced exclusively from the high country.

name: F√©lix Sol√≠s Mucho M√°s Blanco
description: Bright and straw coloured with greenish tints. Complex and subtle on the nose, there are peach and apricot aromas with hints of citrus and smokiness. Rich and mouth-filling in style, with moreish tropical fruit flavours, nuanced vanilla and nicely balanced acidity.

name: DAOU Discovery Collection Ros√© 2020
description:
This wine is fragrant and floral, with aromas of fresh strawberry, sliced peach and watermelon with nuances
of hibiscus, cherry and clover honey. The palate is refreshingly crisp yet lusciously smooth, revealing juicy flavors of nectarine, orange, strawberry parfait and golden delicious apple,  supported by notes of papaya and honeydew melon, and a suggestion of rose hip tea. A long, clean finish lingers with impressions of peach, citrus zest and Barbados cherry.

name: Locations CA (California)
description: Densely purple hued, the wine reveals pleasing aromas of wild flowers, dark berry fruits, plum, dried herbs, and subtle, toasty oak. The entry is profoundly rich with exquisite mineral notes. Flavors of black cherry, dark chocolate, roasted coffee, liquorice, and boysenberry form an intense core. Soft and even tannins provide a pure finish that is highly expressive and everlasting.

name: Clos du Bois Sonoma Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: Dark ruby red color with aromas of black cherry, black plum, tobacco, hints of oak, and mocha. Rich in texture, with a mouth full of black cherry fruit, rich plush tannin, and roasted oak that is well integrated and balanced.

name: Wines from Hahn Estate SLH Pinot Noir 2021
description: Aromas of bright red cherry, strawberry with hints of earth, spices, and toasty oak. An explosion of red fruit including strawberry, cherry and raspberry welcome the palate finish with refined tannins and a soft mouthfeel.

name: Smith & Hook Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: Fragrant aromas of plum and black cherry find perfect balance with hints of vanilla, cola, cloves and cocoa dust. Right on the heels of all that aromatic intensity are interwoven layers of blackberry, boysenberry, black currant, dark plums and mocha. This wine is full bodied with supple tannins and a long, generous finish.

name: Liberty School Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: Aromas of black cherry, plum and violets, followed by subtle flavors of strawberry and allspice. Firm yet supple tannins finish off this approachable fruit-driven Cabernet Sauvignon, making it ideal for a variety of food pairings.

name: Frei Brothers Chardonnay 2022
description: This wine displays flavours of green apple, orange zest and apple pie complemented by notes of butter and toast. The rich, nutty flavours in this chardonnay lead to a silky finish and a plus mouthfeel.

name: J Vineyards Cuv√©e 20 Brut
description: J Cuv√©e 20 Brut gracefully opens up with crisp lemon peel, honeysuckle and delicate yeast aromas. Upon entry, these notes are followed by a mix of Fuji apple, grapefruit and a sweet hint of angel food cake. The mid-palate is interlaced with toast, caramel and almond flavors. The acidity adds just enough liveliness and the citrus zest leads to a lingering, warm pear and lush finish.

name: Apothic Dark (Red Blend) 2021
description: Dark fruit flavors of blueberry and blackberry with opulent notes of coffee and dark chocolate.
allergens: Contains sulfites, egg allergens, milk allergens

name: Domaine de Cabasse Cuv√©e Marguerite C√¥tes du Rh√¥ne 2021
description: Very fruity, aerial nose with discrete notes of ripe red fruits. The aromas of red fruits extend pleasantly on the palate. This wine is the perfect expression of the young vines from which it comes.

name: Ghost Pines Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: Bold and intensely flavoured. Aromas of dark fruit jam, sweet nuts and black pepper that meld with dark berry fruit flavours with sweet vanilla nuances. The palate is dense and chewy with round tannins and an enduring finish.

name: Verdon Estate Stonebridge Vineyards Reserve No.8 Chardonnay 2021
DAOU Chardonnay 2022
description: The 2018 vintage showcases how Chardonnay excels in Paso Robles vineyards that are carefully selected by Winemaker Daniel Daou for their pronounced maritime influence. This lush and luxuriant Chardonnay presents tropical aromas of pineapple, mango and freshly sliced banana, all accented by captivating accents of nutmeg, vanilla, honeysuckle, and hazelnut. The palate is voluminous and silky, unfolding with elegant flavors of honeydew melon, golden delicious apple and lemon curd. Secondary layers offer hints of kiwi, papaya, baking spice and clover honey. A clean, lengthy finish lingers with essences of melon, mango, citrus and toasty oak.

name: Apothic Red (Winemaker's Blend) 2021
allergens: Contains sulfites, egg allergens, milk allergens

name: Edict Reserve Russian River Valley Chardonnay 2021
Ashby Park Estates Pinot Noir Reserve 3 Barrel Select Coastal 2020
Frisson Alluvium Coombsville Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2020
Cobb Coastlands Vineyard Diane Cobb Pinot Noir 2017
Pine Ridge The Traveler's Series Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
DAOU A Curious Collection Blend No. 49A 2020
DAOU A Curious Collection Blend No. 39B 2020
DAOU Reserve Collection By the Glass
Tenuta Carretta Barolo Poderi in Cannubi 2013
description: Garnet red with orange highlights. An austere complex wine with an intense warm flavour mellowed by the nobility and softness of the tannins. Pairing: Red meats, game, roasts & mature cheeses.

name: Frank Family Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: Deep purple in color. On the nose, the glass bursts with aromas of cocoa powder mingled with blackberries and vanilla. The palate bursts with juicy cherries and roasted figs.

name: The Crane Assembly El Coco 2021
description: Aromatics like boysenberry jam and black plum lead to candied raspberries and nutmeg. The palate is ripe with dark stone fruits, blueberries, a hint of meatiness and confectionary orange, akin to mandarin encased foie gras.

name: Terre Nere Campigli Vallone Brunello di Montalcino 2017
Roger Sabon Ch√¢teauneuf-du-Pape Le Secret Des Sabon 2020
Nickel & Nickel State Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description: Aromas and flavors. Juicy berry fruits, chocolate, vanilla, dried herb and char blend together in harmony on a soft, velvety texture. The tannins are incredibly supple and long, adding to the warmth and elegance of the wine.

name: Belharra Alder Springs Vineyard Pinot Noir 2019
Beau Vigne Cult Cabernet Sauvignon 2021
description:
One of the most popular wines among the Vivino community, the bold and earthy Beau Vigne Cult Cabernet Sauvignon boasts a unique complexity with each glass. With origins in Beau Vigne winery, Cult Cabernet Sauvignon has all the trademarks of a prodigious Napa Valley wine. Our Vivino community lovingly describe the Beau Vigne Cult Cabernet Sauvignon as starting out tannic and finishing to chocolate, with black fruit, leather and tobacco notes, as well as a whisper of anise and mushroom inbetween.

Coined in the 1900s, the term ‚Äúcult wine‚Äù was used to describe Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon wines that sold for large sums of money. Growing in popularity over the twentieth and twenty-first centuries, cult wines present a benchmark to a region‚Äôs potential quality, which you can taste from the first sip of Cult Cabernet Sauvignon.

Boasting a charming, deep ruby colour, Beau Vigne Cult Cabernet Sauvignon is a much-loved wine, predominantly down to its careful ageing process, complex mouthfeel and versatility when it comes to food pairings. Perfectly complementing hearty meat dishes such as beef, lamb, game and poultry, as well as mature and hard cheese, the Beau Vigne Cult Cabernet Sauvignon (in particular Cult Cabernet Sauvignon 2019, 2017 and 2014) is a wonderful red wine for hosting.

name: Lenotti Amarone della Valpolicella Classico 2018
description: Dry, warm, full-bodied and intense wine; its flavours and scents are emphasised by the very long period of ageing in wood butts. Dark brick ruby red. Ethereal, intense, with the scents of the selected wooden barrels. Intense and velvety.

name: Miner Chardonnay 2022
description: A decade after our Chardonnay put us on the map, the 2007 Napa Chardonnay remains a tried-and-true classic and a testament to Gary Brookman's fine winemaking skills. Malolactic fermentation in moderation keeps this Chardonnay sleek on the palate with remarkably fresh appley fruit and keenly placed acidity on the long, crisp finish.

name: Orin Swift Mannequin 2020
description: Gilded in bright yellow, an alluring perfume of candied lemon, Bosc pear, wild flower, and honeydew melon incentivize the palate. Upon entry, a deliciously rich and creamy texture balances out vivid tropical fruit notes, exotic spices, and fresh pineapple that slowly emerge in a captivating way.

name: Ch√¢teau Haut Grela Blaye C√¥tes De Bordeaux 2019
Landy Family Vineyards Gravel Series Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
Mer Soleil Reserve Chardonnay 2022
description: Golden-hued in color, the wine opens with opulent aromas of peach, apple, Meyer lemon and baking spices. The palate is an inviting medley of peach and D‚ÄôAnjou pear; layered with tropical notes of pineapple and banana. The vibrant acidity is well balanced by warm butterscotch and subtle coconut notes that seamlessly meld together to create a luscious, mouth-filling richness.

name: Ch√¢teau la Rose Beaumont Blaye C√¥tes de Bordeaux Rouge 2019
Se√±orio de Villarrica Delicia de Baco Crianza 2017
DAOU A Curious Collection Blend No. 52B 2020
Arling Blaze Hope Dies Last Proprietary Red 2022
Walt Pinot Noir 2021
description: Deep red in color, this wine has intense aromas of nougat, brown spice, bright cherry, and wet stone. The palate is full and layered with flavors of red berry fruit coulis and bright acidity. Very long and rich it is a true representation of the Sta. Rita Hills.
